Title: Subsidizes closing costs for low income current tenants who are purchasing a home
Summary: Calls for the state to subsidize a portion of closing costs for certain individuals who have been tenants of public housing projects or rent subsidized housing for the previous five years.
LawCode: Add ยง615, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to subsidizing closing costs for low income tenants who are purchasing a home
